snippet: Several well-known weight-loss specialists announced their support for Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg’s proposal to restrict sales of big sugary drinks.
abstract: Several well-known weight-loss specialists voice their support for New York City Mayor Michael R Bloomberg’s proposal to restrict sales of large-size sugary drinks; during a news conference, many endorsers are careful to frame the proposal not as a restriction on choices but as a way to nudge New Yorkers toward controlling their portion sizes--a tenet of many weight-loss programs.
lead_paragraph: Several well-known weight-loss specialists announced their support for Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg’s proposal to restrict sales of big sugary drinks.
